WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthA: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance SMG, SG and HG type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthB: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance AR, GL and RL type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthC: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance MG, SR, MT and RG type weapons.
WeaponPartExpBonus.WeaponExpGrowthZ: Provides 1.5× EXP when used to enhance any type of weapon.

BuffTooltip.Buff_AmmoCount: Increases the maximum amount of weapon ammunition used by Normal Attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ATK: Increases the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_AttackSpeed: Increases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and reduces attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Buff_BlockRate: Increases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Buff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostChange: Reduces the amount of skill cost required for using the EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostRegen: Increases the rate at which skill cost is recovered.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChance: Increases the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: Decerases the chance of receiving a critical hit when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamage: Increases the damage dealt by critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalDamageRateResist: Decreases the damage received from critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedLimit: Limits the amount of damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedRatio: Decreases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DEF: Decreases the damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Dodge: Increases the chance of successfully evading attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_DotHeal: Continuously restores HP at set intervals.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceExplosionRate: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhancePierceRate: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceMysticRate: Increases the bonus damage dealt by Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealByHit_Damaged: Restores HP each time damage is taken from an attack.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealEffectiveness: Increases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealPower: Increases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
BuffTooltip.Buff_HIT: Decreases the chance of missing when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionPower: Increases the chance of successfully inflicting Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionResist: Decreases the chance of being inflicting with Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Penetration: Increases the amount of enemy defense that will be ignored by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Range: Increases the distance from which Normal Attacks can be performed.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Shield: Absorbs a set amount of damage.
BuffTooltip.Buff_Stability: Increases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AmmoCount: Decreases the maximum amount of weapon ammunition used by Normal Attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ATK: Decreases the amount of damage dealt by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AttackSpeed: Decreases the speed of Normal Attacks and reloads, and increases attack delay.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_BlockRate: Decreases the chance of successfully blocking attacks when taking cover.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Burn: Continuously receives Burn damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Chill: Continuously receives Chill damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ConcentratedTarget: Becomes the priority target of enemies' attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CostChange: Increases the amount of skill cost required for using the EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CostRegen: Decreases the rate at which skill cost is recovered.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChance: Decreases the chance of landing a critical hit when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: Increases the chance of receiving a critical hit when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalDamage: Decreases the damage dealt by critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalDamageRateResist: Increases the damage received from critical hits.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageByHit_Damaged: Receives additional damage when being attacked.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamagedRatio: Increases all incoming damage by a percentage amount.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DEF: Increases the damage received from attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Dodge: Decreases the chance of successfully evading attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceExplosionRate: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Explosive type attacks against Light Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhancePierceRate: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Piercing type attacks against Heavy Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceMysticRate: Decreases the bonus damage dealt by Mystic type attacks against Special Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealedLimit: Limits the amount of HP healing abilities will restore.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealEffectiveness: Decreases the amount of HP restored from healing abilities that target this character.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealPower: Decreases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities, and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Hieronymus: Inflicts continuous damage over time. Inflicts a large amount of damage in a circular area around the target if this debuff is not removed before it expires. This debuff can only be removed by healing the afflicted to 100% HP.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HIT: Increases the chance of missing when attacking.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionPower: Decreases the chance of successfully inflicting Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionResist: Increases the chance of being inflicting with Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Penetration: Decreases the amount of enemy defense that will be ignored by attacks.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Poison: Continuously receives poison damage at set intervals. This damage cannot critically hit.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Range: Decreases the distance from which Normal Attacks can be performed.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Stability: Decreases the minimum damage dealt by attacks due to random damage variance.
BuffTooltip.CC_Fear: Unable to act and will slowly move away from whoever inflicted fear on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Stunned: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Provoke: Forced to attack whoever inflicted taunt on them. Also interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.CC_Paralysis: Unable to act and interrupts any active skills.
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryHalf:
Increases the effectiveness of Aris's EX and Sub skills by 1.5× (half) or 2× (full).
Charge level resets to empty after EX skill use.
BuffTooltip.Special_Immortal: Able to survive lethal damage with 1 HP for the duration of the effect.
BuffTooltip.Special_Fury: Increases the damage dealt by Neru's EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_Misdeed: Decreases DEF with each stack held and generates skill cost when Aru (New Year) uses her EX Skill.
BuffTooltip.Special_LittleDevil: Increases Crit DMG with each stack held and increases the damage dealt by Mutuski (New Year)'s Basic Skill when at 6 stacks.
BuffTooltip.Special_Accumulation: All damage dealt to this target for the duration of the effect will be accumulated and dealt again as an additional hit once this expires.
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneCC: Immune to all Crowd Control effects.
BuffTooltip.Special_SuddenDeath: A stack of 5 will deal lethal damage to the character.
BuffTooltip.Special_Stamp: Reduces allies' EX skill cost and restores own HP when Kokona reaches 5 stacks.
